scripts.start: AGENTS=2 BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) yarn run network
scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 yarn run x
scripts.x: hc s clean && yarn run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "yarn workspace ui start" "yarn run start:happ" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s $SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.tool-devy: concurrently "yarn workspace ui start" "sleep 1 && weave --agent-idx 1 --dev-config weave/config.ts" "sleep 10 && weave --agent-idx 2 --dev-config weave/config.ts --sync-time 20000"
scripts.tool-devx: BPORT=46263 SPORT=46262; concurrently "hc run-local-services -b $BPORT -s $SPORT" "yarn workspace ui start" "./weave/we.AppImage  --dev-config weave/config.json --agent-num 1 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT" "sleep 10 && ./weave/we.AppImage --dev-config weave/config.json --agent-num 2 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT"
scripts.network: hc s clean && yarn run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "yarn workspace ui start" "yarn run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: yarn run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && yarn workspace tests test
scripts.launch:happ: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/converge.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.package: rm -f ui/dist.zip && rm -rf ui/dist && yarn build:happ && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' yarn workspace ui package && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting with admin $VITE_ADMIN_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/converge.happ --run=$VITE_APP_PORT -a converge network -b "http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT"  webrtc "ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.build:happ: yarn run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
